title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of restaurants, with a total of 14 data points.
Overall Number of restaurants has decreased over the Year.
Number of restaurants is roughly constant from 2013 to 2012, slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2008, roughly constant from 2008 to 2004, and lastly gradually decreasing from 2004 to 2000.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2008.
Max Number of restaurants about 705.0 was recorded at Year 2013
Min Number of restaurants about 654.0 was recorded at Year 2000
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of restaurants, with a total of 14 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2013 to 2008.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2004 to 2000.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2006 to 2004.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is slightly constant which exists from 2008 to 2006.
